p: Wild-type C57BL/6 mice were divided into three groups (9 to 10 mice per group). Mice were administered vehicle, ifenprodil (20 mg/kg, intraperitoneally), or flavopiridol (5 mg/kg, intraperitoneally) at 24 h and 3 h before and 24 h and 48 h after infection (10 6 TCID 50 of H5N1 virus). The survival and body weight changes of the mice in each group were assessed daily for 14 days. The log rank test was used to compare the Kaplan-Meier survival curves.
